  • API REFERENCE

      • ECards

      • Balance

# ECards

# Get ecards

  • URL: /v1/ecards
  • Method: GET
  • Headers:
    • Authorization: Bearer [YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN] required
    • Content-Type: application/json

# Response

  • Status: 200 OK
  • Type: json

# Response body

Field Type Description
id int32 id ecard
name string vendor name ecard
unit enum nominal unit (ruble, month)
faceValues obj (contains the face value )
# FaceValue
Field Type Description
name string name face value (Example:1000 ₽, 1 мес. )
price int32 face value price

# Example

[
 {
   "id": "1",
   "name": "Хофф",
   "description": "description",
   "faceValues": {
     "name": "1000 ₽",
     "price": 1100
   }
 
 },
 {
   "id": "2",
   "name": "Л'Этуаль",
   "description": "description",
   "faceValues": {
     "name": "500 ₽",
     "price": 500
   }
 }
]
